actions.description: The golem makes two slam attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 19 (3d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage.
actions.name: Slam

actions.description: The golem targets one or more creatures it can see within 10 feet of it. Each target must make a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw against this magic. On a failed save, a target can't use reactions, its speed is halved, and it can't make more than one attack on its turn. In addition, the target can take either an action or a bonus action on its turn, not both. These effects last for 1 minute. A target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.
actions.name: Slow (Recharge 5–6)

damage_immunities: Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing from Nonmagical Attacks that aren't Adamantine
languages: Understands the languages of its creator but can't speak
name: Stone Golem

traits.description: The golem is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.
traits.name: Immutable Form

traits.description: The golem has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
traits.name: Magic Resistance

traits.description: The golem's weapon attacks are magical.
traits.name: Magic Weapons
